title: How do I set a screen unlock pattern?
answer:
1. Go to Settings and touch Security > Screen lock > Pattern. 

 1. On Draw an unlock pattern screen, swipe your finger across the screen to connect four or more dots together in a pattern and touch Continue. 

 1. Draw the pattern again and touch Confirm. 

 1. [When you power on your phone or press the power button to turn on the screen, draw the pattern to unlock the screen.]()
